rows.label: tlk42300023_02_msg0001
rows.name:
They're selling all sorts of
food, drinks, and luxury items
at the Avaritia Bazaar, mo.

rows.label: tlk42300023_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently, using them can temporarily
boost your abilities, mo!

rows.label: tlk42300023_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They didn't have anything like
this in the village where
Razzlydazzly was born... mo.

rows.label: tlk42300023_02_msg0004
rows.name:
They're useful, so I'll
stock up on them and make
good use of them, mo!
